name: TakeMeFishing
0:
”Alexa, ask Take Me Fishing to suggest a place to fish near Dallas”
”What species can I find in Bear Creek”
”Alexa, ask Take Me Fishing about my daily update”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: take me fishing
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Find fishing spots near you and go out fishing today. Search for nearby waters to fish, local fishing spots, and get the daily fishing forecast with fish species information. Try our new Alexa daily update and find more information about what species have been caught in your area, the biggest catches, what lakes are hot, what bait works, etc. Also ask Alexa for directions to your favorite fishing spot.

Only public waters that are maintained by state or federal agencies are included, ensuring healthy fish, state boat ramps, accessible recreational amenities and more.
